attributes.action: stop councils using the Human Rights Act as a means of not disclosing the wages of the highest earning council officers and managers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils have been trying to use the "Right to privacy" as a means of not disclosing the wages of the top managers. I feel that council tax should not be used for £100 000 a year salaries.
